dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: commLineage
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores tracks the lineage of vegetation community concepts.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value to each unique record in the commLineage table.
This is the foreign key into the commConcept table "pointing" to the child concept.
This is the foreign key into the commConcept table "pointing" to the parent concept.
